author: alekstheod
message:
PR #34049: [ROCm] Add support for rocm tar/wheels in hermetic builds

Imported from GitHub PR https://github.com/openxla/xla/pull/34049

üìù Summary of Changes
Add support for python wheels as a hermetic rocm dependency

üéØ Justification
Jax requires python wheels as a hermetic dependency so it can match
the wheels when setting up jax dependencies.

üöÄ Kind of Contribution
Please remove what does not apply:
‚ú® New Feature

üìä Benchmark (for Performance Improvements)
Not relevant

üß™ Unit Tests:
Not relevant

üß™ Execution Tests:
Not relevant

Copybara import of the project:

--
c3e5e2fedca9f7c5f7061d1c036bf67b4c5e2537 by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Switch to use rocm redist tarball

--
a568eb9238563d1fb84f029772f950ae577c7e5e by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

66b21fc401e87705c63441db0d489aff5a1c5862 by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Exclude invalid so file

ec2a8f3f8821c44d0f8578ebf110c218a5407bee by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Fix hermetic setup

--
378ba9b138eebad5e99621cca1ba82d1f761d186 by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Revert try with a custom llvm

--
c42caee607afdd8d7d7cd40dbee701dd914949eb by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Add required links field

--
a86716422eca1aeba1932a25b4df40d4f6524b66 by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Add Dragans patch

--
898ea668d8b9ddb887af336618c6b58d5831e998 by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Add missing dependency

--
3b3f21fb4cdf49152ce70f30c714473fcd836d82 by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Disable dynamic_mode for hermetic build rocm

--
882c25968eeac797fb5f4c1d4f3152222b29d1ee by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Fix non hermetic build

--
21fdbbbb795d5bf192a4ff755ae3795683aa7201 by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Use MD_COMGR_NAMESPACE instead of dynamice_mode=off

--
1dbd29ce49df622be8e543fe81f0a954fda57c53 by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Revert "Use MD_COMGR_NAMESPACE instead of dynamice_mode=off"

This reverts commit 21fdbbbb795d5bf192a4ff755ae3795683aa7201.

--
f44de1fb3bdf3572edeb0c17c8defefe29e08c93 by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Use rpath instead of creating links for llvm

--
b78afabc9040b415c659d179b1a610c56a177560 by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Remove unwanted config line

--
45023eddb5c9c8aa8f6dcfc379e9903954f63021 by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Add support of python wheels as a hermetic rocm dependency

--
474898970d13951ff4716c528083ac4aaff36332 by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

27807bdd416559ea8b81ed606b24938f5a7ead02 by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

6ed67b287b32d37e49097e4ad2fa058e0b4e5c7c by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Address copilot review comment

@@ -287,9 +287,9 @@ common:rocm_clang_official --host_linkopt="-fuse-ld=lld"
 common:rocm --config=rocm_clang_official

+common:rocm_ci_hermetic --dynamic_mode=off
 common:rocm_ci_hermetic --config=rocm_clang_official
-common:rocm_ci_hermetic --repo_env="OS=ubuntu_22.04"

 # This config option is used for SYCL as GPU backend.

         ":build_hermetic": [
             "-Wl,-rpath,external/local_config_rocm/rocm/%{rocm_root}/lib",

+            "-Lexternal/local_config_rocm/rocm/%{rocm_root}/lib",

             "-Wl,-rpath=%{rocm_lib_paths}",

+        ],
+        exclude = [
+            # exclude files like libamdhip64.so.7.1.25445-7484b05b13 -> misplaced
+            "%{rocm_root}/**/*.so.*.*",
+        ],
+    ),
     hdrs = glob(["%{rocm_root}/include/hip/**"]),
     include_prefix = "rocm",
     includes = [
@@ -191,12 +199,17 @@ cc_library(
 # Used by jax_rocm_plugin to minimally link to hip runtime.
 cc_library(
     name = "hip_runtime",
-    srcs = glob([
-        "%{rocm_root}/lib/libamdhip*.so*",
-        "%{rocm_root}/lib/libhiprtc.so*",
-        "%{rocm_root}/lib/libhiprtc-builtins.so*",
-        "%{rocm_root}/lib/libamd_comgr.so*",
-    ]),
+    srcs = glob(
+        [
+            "%{rocm_root}/lib/libamdhip*.so*",
+            "%{rocm_root}/lib/libhiprtc.so*",
+            "%{rocm_root}/lib/libhiprtc-builtins.so*",
+        ],

+            # exclude files like libamdhip64.so.7.1.25445-7484b05b13 -> misplaced
+            "%{rocm_root}/**/*.so.*.*",
+        ],
+    ),
     hdrs = glob(["%{rocm_root}/include/hip/**"]),
     include_prefix = "rocm",
     includes = [
@@ -207,6 +220,7 @@ cc_library(
     deps = [
         ":amd_comgr",
         ":rocm_config",
+        ":rocm_rpath",
         ":rocprofiler_register",
         ":system_libs",
     ],
@@ -217,6 +231,7 @@ cc_library(
     hdrs = glob(["%{rocm_root}/include/rocblas/**"]),
     data = glob([
         "%{rocm_root}/lib/librocblas*.so*",
+        "%{rocm_root}/lib/librocroller*.so*",
         "%{rocm_root}/lib/rocblas/**",
     ]),
     include_prefix = "rocm",
@@ -314,6 +329,7 @@ cc_library(

+        ":roctracer",
         ":system_libs",
     ],
 )
@@ -363,11 +379,11 @@ cc_library(

     name = "roctracer",
-    hdrs = glob(["%{rocm_root}/include/roctracer/**"]),
-    data = glob([

         "%{rocm_root}/lib/libroctracer*.so*",
         "%{rocm_root}/lib/libroctx64.so*",
     ]),
+    hdrs = glob(["%{rocm_root}/include/roctracer/**"]),
     include_prefix = "rocm",
     includes = [
         "%{rocm_root}/include/",
@@ -517,16 +533,28 @@ cc_library(

     name = "amd_comgr",
-    srcs = glob([
+    hdrs = glob(["%{rocm_root}/include/amd_comgr/**"]),

+        "%{rocm_root}/lib/libamd_comgr_loader.so*",
         "%{rocm_root}/lib/libamd_comgr.so*",

     include_prefix = "rocm",
     includes = [
         "%{rocm_root}/include",
     ],
+    linkopts = select({
+        ":build_hermetic": [
+            "-lamd_comgr_loader",
+        ],
+        "//conditions:default": [],
+    }),
     strip_include_prefix = "%{rocm_root}",
-    deps = [":rocm_config"],
+    deps = [
+        ":rocm_config",
+        ":rocm_rpath",
+        ":system_libs",
+    ],
 )
 
 cc_library(
@@ -550,13 +578,10 @@ cc_library(

     name = "system_libs",
     srcs = glob([
-        "rocm_dist/usr/lib/**/libelf.so*",

     ]),

     ]),
 )
